info.female_impression:
Anton keeps saying he's the "second-best driller in the company."
So... who's the first?
info.male_impression: I think it's the heavy drill machine from their company. I've heard him say something like "I gotta win next time" against it.
info.outlook_desc:
New Eridu Citizen Verification Profile Info:
Hollow Investigator � Anton, possessing good Ether aptitude, is allowed to perform basic tasks like investigating and extracting resources in known Hollows within the city (including Companion Hollows).
Note: Besides himself, Anton's bro also possesses relatively good Ether aptitude.
info.profile_desc:
Anton is a key member of construction staff at Belobog Industries and one of Koleda's trusted aides.
"Got a job you can't handle? Leave it to me!"
 Anton is one of the top brass at Belobog, handpicked by its former president Khors, which makes him a "senior employee."
A genuine, straightforward man, always boosting the morale of his coworkers with his surplus of energy.

Apart from this, it seems Anton is always talking to his jackhammer, affectionately calling it, "Bro."
An instance from Anton's everyday life goes like this:
Anton, seemingly in dialogue with himself, asks, "Whaddaya think, Bro?" 
The jackhammer replies, "Vroom vroom vroom�"
Anton, apparently enlightened, responds, "I see, I see! You still got it, Bro!"
Unfortunately, I have not collected enough information on such occurrences and am not able to deliver further analysis.

mindscape_cinemas.description: When Drill Attack hits an enemy, Anton gains additional Energy, up to a maximum of 5 Energy per skill use.
mindscape_cinemas.description2:
"Are you awake? Get spinning, bro!"
"Try and keep up. It's time to do our stretches!"
mindscape_cinemas.name: Warm-Up Exercises

mindscape_cinemas.description: When Anton uses his EX Special Attack and enters Burst Mode, he gains a Shield that equals to 7.5% of his Max HP. While in Burst Mode, entering combat or switching in reapplies the Shield effect. This effect can trigger once every 15s. The Shield dissipates when Burst Mode ends.
mindscape_cinemas.description2:
After arduous training, a few lucky individuals will display exceptional vigor and perform above their usual level during high-intensity activities, entering a state of flow commonly known as "being in the zone."
Are you ready to get moving and enter the zone?
� Nitro-Fuel's exclusive program "Good Morning, Zealous Office Workers!"
mindscape_cinemas.name: State of Flow

mindscape_cinemas.description: Basic Attack, Dodge, Assist, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2
mindscape_cinemas.description2: Knowing a bit of everything may seem underwhelming, but in a complex and ever-changing Hollow worksite, having a wide skillset can present an opportunity to overcome difficulties.
mindscape_cinemas.name: Rotational Training

mindscape_cinemas.description: When Anton uses a Chain Attack or Ultimate, all squad members' CRIT Rate increases by 10% for 12s.
mindscape_cinemas.description2:
"Find your rhythm, and let's get moving!"
When Anton starts to get serious, everyone becomes more nimble.
They have to keep up or else they will be training alone the next day.
mindscape_cinemas.name: Everyone Get Fired Up!

mindscape_cinemas.description: Basic Attack, Dodge, Assist, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2
mindscape_cinemas.description2: Knowing a bit of everything may seem underwhelming, but if you are resolute enough to change from "knowing a bit" to "being excellent," then you become omnipotent!
mindscape_cinemas.name: Jack of All Trades

mindscape_cinemas.description: When Anton's Piledriver Attack triggers a critical hit, his Basic Attack: Enthusiastic Drills (Burst Mode) and Dodge Counter: Overload Drill (Burst Mode) deal 4% more DMG for 30s, stacking up to 6 times. Repeated triggers reset the duration.
mindscape_cinemas.description2:
"Yeah bro, can you feel the burn?"
Whenever Anton wants to exceed his limits,
his "bro" starts spinning at an astonishing pace, its buzzing echoing Anton's resolution.
mindscape_cinemas.name: Break the Limit

descriptions: When Anton uses his Piledriver Attack, the skill's DMG is increased by 12% and when he uses his Drill Attack, the skill's DMG is increased by 20%.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
While Anton is in Burst Mode, for every 4 critical hits, the next attack hitting Shocked enemies triggers an additional bout of Shock DMG at 45% of the original DMG. This effect can trigger once every 0.5s.
When Anton uses his Piledriver Attack, the skill's DMG is increased by 14% and when he uses his Drill Attack, the skill's DMG is increased by 23.3%.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
While Anton is in Burst Mode, for every 4 critical hits, the next attack hitting Shocked enemies triggers an additional bout of Shock DMG at 45% of the original DMG. This effect can trigger once every 0.5s.
When Anton uses his Piledriver Attack, the skill's DMG is increased by 16% and when he uses his Drill Attack, the skill's DMG is increased by 26.6%.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
While Anton is in Burst Mode, for every 4 critical hits, the next attack hitting Shocked enemies triggers an additional bout of Shock DMG at 45% of the original DMG. This effect can trigger once every 0.5s.
When Anton uses his Piledriver Attack, the skill's DMG is increased by 18% and when he uses his Drill Attack, the skill's DMG is increased by 30%.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
While Anton is in Burst Mode, for every 4 critical hits, the next attack hitting Shocked enemies triggers an additional bout of Shock DMG at 45% of the original DMG. This effect can trigger once every 0.5s.
When Anton uses his Piledriver Attack, the skill's DMG is increased by 20% and when he uses his Drill Attack, the skill's DMG is increased by 33.3%.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
While Anton is in Burst Mode, for every 4 critical hits, the next attack hitting Shocked enemies triggers an additional bout of Shock DMG at 45% of the original DMG. This effect can trigger once every 0.5s.
When Anton uses his Piledriver Attack, the skill's DMG is increased by 22% and when he uses his Drill Attack, the skill's DMG is increased by 36.6%.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
While Anton is in Burst Mode, for every 4 critical hits, the next attack hitting Shocked enemies triggers an additional bout of Shock DMG at 45% of the original DMG. This effect can trigger once every 0.5s.
When Anton uses his Piledriver Attack, the skill's DMG is increased by 24% and when he uses his Drill Attack, the skill's DMG is increased by 40%.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
While Anton is in Burst Mode, for every 4 critical hits, the next attack hitting Shocked enemies triggers an additional bout of Shock DMG at 45% of the original DMG. This effect can trigger once every 0.5s.

descriptions.description:
When the active character is launched, press  to activate:
Continuously strikes enemies in front of him with heavy punches, dealing Physical DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
descriptions.name: Quick Assist: Shoulder-To-Shoulder

descriptions.description:
When the active character is launched, press  to activate:
Attacks enemies in front with a Drill Attack, dealing massive Electric DMG.
Character is invulnerable during the attack.
descriptions.name: Quick Assist: Protective Drill (Burst Mode)

descriptions.description:
When the character on field is about to be attacked, press  to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
This skill excels at parrying enemy attacks and reduces the consumption of Assist Points when the character is under intense attacks.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
descriptions.name: Defensive Assist: Iron Wrist

descriptions.description:
Press  after a Defensive Assist to activate:
Launches a Drill Attack that ends in a Piledriver Attack, dealing Electric DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
descriptions.name: Assist Follow-Up: Limit Burst

descriptions.description:
Press  to activate:
Unleashes up to 4 mixed attacks in front, dealing Physical DMG.
The 4th-hit is a Piledriver Attack.
descriptions.name: Basic Attack: Enthusiastic Drills

descriptions.description:
Press  while Anton is in Burst Mode to activate:
Unleashes up to 3 mixed attacks in front, dealing massive Electric DMG.
During the 2nd Drill Attack and 3rd Piledriver Attack, press repeatedly or hold  to extend the skill duration.
descriptions.name: Basic Attack: Enthusiastic Drills (Burst Mode)

descriptions.description:
When a Chain Attack is triggered, select the character to activate:
Unleashes a Piledriver Attack onto the ground in front of him over a large area, dealing massive Electric DMG to enemies within range.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
descriptions.name: Chain Attack: Go Go Go!

descriptions.description:
When Decibel Rating is at Maximum, press  to activate:
Unleashes a Piledriver Attack onto the ground in front of him over a large area, dealing massive Electric DMG to enemies within range.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
descriptions.name: Ultimate: Go Go Go Go Go!
Ultimate: Go Go Go Go Go!

descriptions.description:
Press  to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
descriptions.name: Dodge: Let's Move

descriptions.description:
Press  during a Dodge to activate:
Rams into enemies in front of him, dealing Physical DMG.
descriptions.name: Dash Attack: Fire With Fire

descriptions.description:
Press  during a Perfect Dodge to activate:
Continuously strikes enemies in front with heavy punches, dealing Physical DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
descriptions.name: Dodge Counter: Retaliation

descriptions.description:
While in Burst Mode, press  during a Perfect Dodge to activate:
Launches a Drill Attack at enemies in front of him, dealing massive Electric DMG.
Character is invulnerable during the attack.
descriptions.name: Dodge Counter: Overload Drill (Burst Mode)

descriptions.description:
Press  to activate:
Unleashes a Piledriver Attack against enemies in a line in front, dealing Electric DMG.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.
descriptions.name: Special Attack: Spin, Bro!

descriptions.description:
With enough Energy, press  to activate:
Launches several Piledriver Attacks at enemies in a line in front of him, dealing massive Electric DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
Anton enters Burst Mode after using this skill. When in Burst Mode, Anton's attacks become more powerful, dealing massive Electric DMG while continually consuming Energy upon hitting an enemy. Burst Mode remains active until his Energy is depleted.
descriptions.name: EX Special Attack: Smash the Horizon, Bro!

descriptions.description:
Press  while in Burst Mode to activate:
Launches a Piledriver Attack at enemies in front, dealing Electric DMG.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.
descriptions.name: Special Attack: Explosive Drill (Burst Mode)
EX Special Attack: Smash the Horizon, Bro!
